- Hamptons Housing Estate site is now liveüëá

tweets.text:
What an absolute hero @ben_watt is.

An eloquent, penetrating, insightful and painfully accurate account of the failure by @CanalRiverTrust, @EnvAgency, @BarnetCouncil, @Brent_Council  and @NaturalEngland to safeguard the Welsh Harp SSSI.

Neglect and death by committee. https://t.co/l3STW0SZOQ

urls.title: NATURE is GOD
urls.description: Human beings could live in constant rapture if they recognised the face of God in the divine pattern of Nature.

Our very first repair using 48 rock bags of 2000 kilo each. Thankfully, we had this crane to do the hard work for us.

urls.title: Youth Voice Summit - Rethinking Water
urls.description: A chance for you to input your opinions and experiences on future water management and how you would like to engage in giving your opinion in the decisions made by the Environment Agency in the future.

tweets.text:
Works are progressing well on phase 2 of the #Carlisle Flood Risk Management Scheme

Here's a sneak peak of the new footpath in Bitts Park, near #CarlisleCastle. 

Are you looking forward to using this? 

#ReducingFloodRisk https://t.co/TrEnkYJhvO
York is famous for flooding and cycling. Now that I live in York again, I want to get notified when cycle routes are flooded and impassable https://t.co/dHwf4hIjtD
@JoannaS100 @beeswaxfarming @WildTroutTrust @EnvAgencyMids Hi Joanna - Do you have any press statements on the completion of the project and what it means please? Thanks
@Daubeneyfields @lovethelea_ Hi, I'm a reporter for the Hackney Gazette. I was just wondering if you, or If you know who, took this photo? Thanks, Holly

@Daubeneyfields @lovethelea_ Have you checked the screens are upto today's standard of 6mm. They should've all been installed by 2010, however this doesn't seem to have been actioned in a lot of places. It certainly reduced the amount of sanitary products going into the river here when they went in in 2019.

Newly completed #floodplain reconnection project on Dunston Beck, Lincs, turning former arable field into diverse wetland & meadow habitats. #Partnership managed by WTT's Tim Jacklin along with landowners @beeswaxfarming and funding partner @EnvAgencyMids

Now & then shots https://t.co/O8xhJ6pvgK https://t.co/rBoSg6oazw
@SimonTagg @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Thanks
@EelGroup @environnementca More evidence on eel trafficking being clamped down upon by global authorities. Keep up the good work as this will enable sustainability to be further developed and proved.
@markeltro @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe The link will be published with the agenda next week. I will tweet it thenüëç
@SimonTagg @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Do you have a link, Simon?

Really great discussion at today's Partnership Meeting at @BeDifrent thanks to @DWPDigital, @EnvAgencySE, @Police_ICT, @NHS , @PINSgov for joining us and @Zoe_On_The_Go for organising üòâ https://t.co/3TERsAaCqj
@TheRidgeway1972 @jimfrandisco Not sure, I wonder whether it being at its lowest level since the flooding is something to do with it.

My first public meeting tonight, re: Welsh Harp SSSI neglect.
Astounded at the doublespeak & circumlocution. 
Appalled at how much money is wasted. 
Angered at the lack of accountability by organisations in charge incl. @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency 
Citizens must act and monitor. https://t.co/btZLt2rlPp
